issue.title: [Rust] [Ballista] Add DataFrame support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12256](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12256). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ballista has so far been focused on SQL support rather than DataFrame support. DataFrame support is partially implemented but needs more work to complete.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12256?focusedCommentId=17331530) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Ballista does already support DataFrame
